channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Big new contracts and revenue growth have these stocks moving
item.description: *together with Brooks Enterprises Good day, 360! Here are some top movers today! And don’t forget to join us in Market Masters. And see below for news...

item.title: Investing legend Howard Marks shares how investors can take advantage of ‘irrational’ markets

item.title: Harris accepts Democratic nomination, vows to be a 'common sense' president who 'unites us'
item.description: Kamala Harris is set to face Donald Trump in November's election. Her candidacy was set in motion when President Joe Biden withdrew his reelection bid...

item.title: Canada moves to end rail shutdown quickly; CN workers to return to work Friday
This quick collapse led me to a +10% winner
item.description: Good afternoon, HURRY! ONLY 100 68 seats left in my BACK TO SCHOOL SALE! 60% discount goes to the end of the month but I’m certain those seats go soon...

item.title: ‘I have a dirty secret’: When I fly, I erase ‘basic economy’ on my ticket to skip the boarding line. My friend says it’s cheating. Who’s right?
item.description: “My friend says it’s cheating, as business passengers pay more money for early boarding.”

item.title: World’s second-largest diamond discovered in Botswana
item.description: One of the largest diamonds ever to be excavated was found in Botswana at a mine owned by Canadian firm Lucara Diamond.

item.title: Harris accepts Democratic nomination, vows to be a 'common sense' president who 'unites us'
item.description: Kamala Harris is set to face Donald Trump in November's election. Her candidacy was set in motion when President Joe Biden withdrew his reelection bid...

item.title: I’m a veteran, 53, with 6 degrees and $245,000 in student debt. I plan to discharge my loans due to my disability when I hit $1 million. Is this immoral?
item.description: “After my school expenses are paid, I receive a refund for approximately $7,000 up to four times a year. “

item.title: Harris says Trump 'wants to be an autocrat' and tyrants are 'rooting' for him
item.description: Leon Panetta, Rep. Elissa Slotkin and Sen. Mark Kelly castigated Republican nominee Donald Trump as a threat to American values and national security.

item.title: Europe's wineries battle to survive as extreme heat hurts production
item.description: Extreme weather is threatening production at southern Europe's wineries, with one fine wine grape variety at risk of extinction.

item.title: Tim Walz took an early withdrawal from his retirement account. Is it ever OK to dip into your 401(k)?
item.description: The Democratic vice-presidential candidate’s campaign confirmed Walz’s withdrawal from a 401(k)-type plan.

item.title: This was the schedule of speakers on the final night of the DNC
item.description: Among the speakers: Michigan Gov. Gretchen Whitmer, North Carolina Gov. Roy Cooper and GOP former Rep. Adam Kinzinger. The Chicks and Pink performed.

item.title: Nestle CEO departure seen as 'not such a bad thing' for investors, analyst says
item.description: Nestle has replaced its CEO Mark Schneider with company veteran Laurent Freixe in a bid to shake up its fortunes.

item.title: These META trades highlight an underrated trading strategy…
item.description: I tacked on some small wins to my track record yesterday, and it got me thinking: You know what’s an underrated part of any trading strategy? Momentum...

item.title: New Samsung EV battery technology has captivated silver bulls. Here’s the argument.
item.description: Soaring EV demand, along with solar, jewelry and investment will tighten the market

item.title: Cava earnings beat estimates as restaurant traffic climbs nearly 10%
item.description: The Mediterranean restaurant chain Cava said its fiscal second-quarter traffic climbed 9.5%, bucking industry trends.

item.title: Asia markets mostly lower ahead of Powell's speech at Jackson Hole; Australia snaps 10-day win streak
item.description: While it is not exactly clear what Powell will say, he has previously used the speech to outline broad policy initiatives and to provide policy clues
